text: Yes…just assume they are!...plus several others! In fact (for me) I assume everything that is (minimally) sent over the internet has been scanned for keywords even before you see the email. A lot of what you’ve said is right except that Microsoft and a few others are out to take your clients and put you out of business….a lot like what happened when they stopped making SBS. After all….if it’s in the cloud, kinda out of your control, huh. Rick.

metadata.topic: RE: Microsoft stop messing  with my people's task bar settings.
